item.title: Mypos doesn't work?

@Hypocryte wrote:

If you fixed it with the equals sign, then whoever is using the command was not any rights above a casual player.

item.title: Mypos doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“Hypocryte, post:5, topic:330548”][quote author=lary370 link=topic=426924.msg3135351#msg3135351 date=1266896279]
THis is your code: if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

This is mine: [code] if(command.startsWith(“mypos”) && playerRights >= 0){

Yeah I just threw a equal sign in there and it’s working, thanks.
sM(“AbsX: “+absX+” AbsY: “+absY+””); [/code]

This difference is: && playerRights >= 0){ 

 Your missing the equal sign: [code]playerRights >= 0){[/code]

So try mine It should work!

And
[/quote]
That’s simply claiming that anyone can use it and therefore it shouldn’t even be there. I have my doubts that that’s actually the cause of the problem, and if it is, then the OP is just an idiot for not giving himself rights.[/quote]

Yeah I just threw a equal sign in there and it’s now working, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Mypos doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @Hypocryte Hypocryte
item.description:
@Hypocryte wrote:

[quote=“lary370, post:4, topic:330548”]THis is your code: if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

This is mine: if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights >= 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+"");

This difference is: && playerRights >= 0){ 

 Your missing the equal sign: [code]playerRights >= 0){[/code]

So try mine It should work!

And[/quote]
That’s simply claiming that anyone can use it and therefore it shouldn’t even be there. I have my doubts that that’s actually the cause of the problem, and if it is, then the OP is just an idiot for not giving himself rights.

Read full topic

item.title: Mypos doesn't work?

@lary370 wrote:

THis is your code: if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

This is mine: if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights >= 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+"");

This difference is: && playerRights >= 0){ 

 Your missing the equal sign: [code]playerRights >= 0){[/code]

So try mine It should work!

item.title: Mypos doesn't work?

@daxter852 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }[/quote]
I don’t see anything wrong with it. Meing is the same:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }
